text: Manuela Furlan (born 30 June 1988 in Trieste) is an Italian rugby union player. She is captain of the Italian Rugby Federation. She participated at the 2009 Six Nations Championship, 2013 Summer Universiade, 2015 Six Nations Championship, and 2017 Women's Rugby World Cup. On the club level, she played for Benetton Rugby. == References == Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Trieste
title: Manuela Furlan
